sweep(double) - Method in class Shadow
Run the algorithm, sweeping over all endpoints within the sight range and created bunch of points that represent a polygon of visibility
sweep() - Method in class Shadow
Run the algorithm, sweeping over all endpoints within the sight range and created bunch of points that represent a polygon of visibility Defaults the sight_range to the 1.5 * the sight_pixels
